snippet.title: Torn back to Body Shell - The Transplant begins: Amber 2.0
snippet.description:
Can I revive my full-time home on wheels back from the brink?

In this video I'm attempting to take my 18 year old, semi-auto ex-ambulance turned home on wheels and completely revive it, transplanting everything from a low mileage "other" T1n Sprinter & swapping the transmission over in the process.

The donor van has now been stripped and is gone.
The Engine, gearbox, wiring loom and all other vital parts are all now sat waiting.
The last thing left is to tear my van/home completely apart and start this mammoth task of rebuilding it from the ground up, converting it to manual transmission and fixing the ailments that have plagued this van.

I am not from a mechanical background and this is easily the biggest undertaking of any vehicle I've done, there's going to be a lot of ball's ups, going backwards, fits, blood, tears, and moments of victory.
But I have to make this work. If I don't, well my home can no long move.

Project Amber Merch:
https://projectamber.creator-spring.com

Find most parts, items & accesories I've used in videos on my
Amazon Store:
https://www.amazon.co.uk/shop/projectamber
You can also follow on:
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/project.amber/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProjectAmber25.Vanlife/

Want to help support the channel?:
Patreon: Project.Amber
https://www.patreon.com/Projectamber


#engineswap #willitrun #vanlife
